mapper.select: SELECT MTR_NO FROM MEETINGROOM ORDER BY MTR_NO ASC

SELECT MR.MTR_RESVE_NO, MR.MTR_NO, MR.EMP_NO, MR.RESVE_BEGIN_DATE, MR.RESVE_END_DATE, MR.RESVE_CN, M.MTR_NM, M.MTR_LOC FROM MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION MR, MEETINGROOM M, USER_SETUP_NTCN_MATTER US WHERE M.MTR_NO = #{mtrNo} AND (RESVE_BEGIN_DATE - SYSDATE)*24*60 BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND MR.MTR_NO = M.MTR_NO AND US.USER_SETUP_NO = MR.EMP_NO AND US.SETUP_NTCN_NO = '3' AND US.NTCN_YN_CD = 'Y'

SELECT EMP_NO, ROUND((8 - ((SYSDATE - ATTEND_TIME) * 24) + (CASE WHEN 12 > TO_CHAR(ATTEND_TIME, 'HH24') THEN 1 WHEN 12 = TO_CHAR(ATTEND_TIME, 'HH24') THEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_TIME, 'MI')/60 ELSE 0 END) ),1) AS LVFFC_LEFT FROM ATTENDANCE_MANAGE, USER_SETUP_NTCN_MATTER WHERE SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,10) = SUBSTR(ATTEND_TIME,1,10) AND USER_SETUP_NO = EMP_NO AND SETUP_NTCN_NO = '2' AND NTCN_YN_CD = 'Y'
SELECT E.EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E, USER_SETUP_NTCN_MATTER US WHERE US.USER_SETUP_NO = E.EMP_NO AND US.SETUP_NTCN_NO = '1' AND US.NTCN_YN_CD = 'Y'
